pingball.simulation.collidable

Interface Collidable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedCircle, Line, MovingCircle

    public interface Collidable
    Interface for any collidable object. This object is mutable and can be either a line or a circle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collide(Ball ball)
      Collide this object with ball, changing the velocity of the ball and this object if this object is a MovingCircle.
      void rotate(double angle)
      Rotate this object by a particular angle corresponding to the center of rotation.
      void setRotating(double angularVelocity)
      Set the angular velocity of this object.
      double timeUntilCollision(Ball ball)
      Return the it takes for this object to collide with the ball.

    • Method Detail

      • timeUntilCollision

        double timeUntilCollision(Ball ball)
        Return the it takes for this object to collide with the ball. If the collision will not occur, this method return Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball that will collide with this object
        Returns:
        a double representing the time it takes for this object to collide with the ball

      • collide

        void collide(Ball ball)
        Collide this object with ball, changing the velocity of the ball and this object if this object is a MovingCircle. This method assume the two objects are at the point of impact. Note that this method mutates this object as well as the ball.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball that will collide with this object

      • setRotating

        void setRotating(double angularVelocity)
        Set the angular velocity of this object. Do nothing if this object is a movingcircle
        Parameters:
        angularVelocity - a double representing the angular velocity in radian per second

      • rotate

        void rotate(double angle)
        Rotate this object by a particular angle corresponding to the center of rotation. Do nothing if this object is a movingcircle
        Parameters:
        angle - a double number representing the angle that this object will rotate
